Topic.Title: Trying to use a room for x,y (solved)

Posts.EditableText: What confuses me is that I can't figure out how to add a script to directions or where to do it... I'm not advanced much for code view so I need to know if this is possible at all without going into heavy codes please... On the interface of Quest do i want to create exits and is there a button or something to add scripts to the exits?

Posts.EditableText: Select the exit object itself. Under 'Print message when locked' is a box labeled 'Run a script (instead of moving the player automatically)'. Check the box and it'll let you add a script.
